# subscriptionUpdates

**Type Property**

An asynchronous sequence to use for observing updates to the current state of the user’s subscription to Apple Music.

## Declaration

```swift
static var subscriptionUpdates: MusicSubscription.Updates { get }
```
title: subscriptionUpdates
